TopicTitle: Meu apoastro não aparece no modo carreira

Articles.Content:
há alguns dias, comecei a jogar e não tenho muita experiência com o game, e quando jogo no tutorial, o apoastro e comandos do mapa funcionam normalmente, porém quando vou para o modo carreira, não aparecem os comandos(apoastro, regulagem de orbita, time warp etc). é alguma configuração do meu jogo ou é normal?

Quote

a few days ago, I started playing and I don't have much experience with the game, and when I play in the tutorial, the apoastro and map commands work normally, but when I go to career mode, the commands do not appear (apoastro, orbit adjustment, timewarp etc). is it some setting of my game or is it normal?

 

Edited January 11, 2023 by Vanamonde
Please post in English when not using the International subforums.
Welcome to our forum. In career mode you will not see all of the path planning markers until you have upgraded the tracking station building once or twice.
